title: MedlinePlus - Health Information from the National Library of Medicine
description: Find information on health conditions, wellness issues, and more in easy-to-read language on MedlinePlus, the up-to-date, trusted health information site from the NIH and the National Library of Medicine.
cleaned_text: Welcome to MedlinePlus MedlinePlus is an online health information resource for patients and their families and friends. It is a service of the National Library of Medicine (NLM), the world's largest medical library, which is part of the National Institutes of Health (NIH). [Learn more about MedlinePlus](https://medlineplus.gov/about/) - FEATURED TOPIC - Healthy Aging - As you get older, risk of chronic diseases increases. A healthy lifestyle and chronic condition management can help you live more independently later in
